title: Topic 001 Question 117
body: An employee was terminated, but their access to Google Cloud was not removed until 2 weeks later. You need to find out if this employee accessed any sensitive customer information after their termination. What should you do?
options: View System Event Logs in Cloud Logging. Search for the user's email as the principal.
View System Event Logs in Cloud Logging. Search for the service account associated with the user.
View Data Access audit logs in Cloud Logging. Search for the user's email as the principal.
View the Admin Activity log in Cloud Logging. Search for the service account associated with the user.
